languages.text: "Наши люди вышли к руинам, некогда бывшим то ли дворцом, то ли мегамашиной ксеносов. Численность духов — максимальная. Кажется, они ведут сражение, и в центре схватки находятся две наиболее ярких призрачных фигуры. Одна из них сияет синим, и в облике ее угадываются эльдарские доспехи. Другая пылает лиловым и, кажется, облачена в церемониальные одежды ксеносов. Также они издают звуки, которые схожи с эльдарской речью, однако не поддаются дешифровке".

"Our people have reached the xenos ruins that once served as either a palace or a gargantuan machine. They have encountered an extremely high concentration of spirits. It appears the spirits are fighting among themselves with two particularly vivid ghostly figures among them. One of these prominent spirits radiates blue light and seems to be clad in Aeldari armour. The other is engulfed in purple flames and clad in a xenos ceremonial raiment. They utter sounds reminiscent of Aeldari speech, but any attempts to translate them have proved unsuccessful thus far."
languages.original_text: "Наши люди вышли к руинам, некогда бывшим то ли дворцом, то ли мегамашиной ксеносов. Численность духов — максимальная. Кажется, они ведут сражение, и в центре схватки находятся две наиболее ярких призрачных фигуры. Одна из них сияет синим, и в облике ее угадываются эльдарские доспехи. traits.locale_text: "Our people have reached xenos ruins that once served as either a palace of a gargantuan machine. They have encountered an extremely high concentration of spirits. It appears that the spirits are fighting among themselves, and there are two particularly vivid ghostly figures among them. One of these prominent spirits radiates blue light and seems to be clad in Aeldari armour. The other is engulfed in purple flames and clad in a xenos ceremonial raiment. They utter sounds reminiscent of Aeldari speech, but any attempts to translate them have been unsuccessful thus far."

The other is engulfed in purple flames and clad in a xenos ceremonial raiment. They utter sounds reminiscent of Aeldari speech, but any attempts to translate them have proved unsuccessful thus far."

languages.text: “我们的人抵达了异形遗址，那里似乎是某种宫殿或巨型机器的残骸。遗址中聚集着大量幽灵，这群幽灵看起来正在自相残杀。其中，有两个幽灵样貌格外显眼。一个幽灵散发着蓝光，似乎穿着艾达灵族的盔甲。另一个幽灵则被紫色的火焰所吞没，穿着异形的仪式服。它们的声音听起来很像艾达灵族的语言，但到目前为止，我们未能顺利翻译出他们的语言。”
languages.original_text: "Our people have reached the xenos ruins that once served as either a palace or a gargantuan machine. They have encountered an extremely high concentration of spirits. It appears the spirits are fighting among themselves with two particularly vivid ghostly figures among them. One of these prominent spirits radiates blue light and seems to be clad in Aeldari armour. The other is engulfed in purple flames and clad in a xenos ceremonial raiment. They utter sounds reminiscent of Aeldari speech, but any attempts to translate them have proved unsuccessful thus far."

traits.locale_text: “我们的人抵达了异形遗址，那里似乎是某种宫殿或巨型机器的残骸。遗址中聚集着大量幽灵，这群幽灵看起来正在自相残杀。其中，有两个幽灵样貌格外显眼。一个幽灵散发着蓝光，似乎穿着艾达灵族的盔甲。另一个幽灵则被紫色的火焰所吞没，穿着异形的仪式服。它们的声音听起来很像艾达灵族的语言，但到目前为止，我们未能顺利翻译出他们的语言。”

languages.text: «Nuestra gente ha llegado a las ruinas xenos que una vez sirvieron de palacio o de máquina colosal. Se han encontrado con una concentración extremadamente alta de espíritus. Parece que los espíritus están luchando entre ellos, con dos figuras fantasmales particularmente intensas entre ellos. Uno de ellos irradia luz azul y parece ir vestido con una armadura Aeldari. El otro está envuelto en llamas púrpuras y viste un atuendo ceremonial xenos. Pronuncian sonidos que recuerdan al habla Aeldari, pero los intentos de traducirlos han resultado infructuosos hasta ahora».
languages.original_text: "Our people have reached the xenos ruins that once served as either a palace or a gargantuan machine. They have encountered an extremely high concentration of spirits. It appears the spirits are fighting among themselves with two particularly vivid ghostly figures among them. One of these prominent spirits radiates blue light and seems to be clad in Aeldari armour. The other is engulfed in purple flames and clad in a xenos ceremonial raiment. They utter sounds reminiscent of Aeldari speech, but any attempts to translate them have proved unsuccessful thus far."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestra gente ha llegado a las ruinas xenos que una vez sirvieron de palacio o de máquina colosal. Se han encontrado con una concentración extremadamente alta de espíritus. Parece que los espíritus están luchando entre ellos, con dos figuras fantasmales particularmente intensas entre ellos. Uno de ellos irradia luz azul y parece ir vestido con una armadura Aeldari. El otro está envuelto en llamas púrpuras y viste un atuendo ceremonial xenos. Pronuncian sonidos que recuerdan al habla Aeldari, pero los intentos de traducirlos han resultado infructuosos hasta ahora».

languages.text: 「我々の兵が、かつて宮殿か巨大な機械として機能していたゼノの遺跡にたどり着き、ぎゅうぎゅうに密集していた精霊たちに遭遇しました。どうやら精霊たちの間で争いが起きていて、その中でも特に2体の精霊の姿が鮮明だったそうです。そのうちの1体は青い光を放ち、アエルダリの鎧をまとっているようです。他方は紫色の炎に包まれ、ゼノの儀式用の衣装をまとっています。彼らはアエルダリの言葉と似たような音を発しているのですが、これまでのところ翻訳の試みは成功していないとのことです」
languages.original_text: "Our people have reached the xenos ruins that once served as either a palace or a gargantuan machine. They have encountered an extremely high concentration of spirits. It appears the spirits are fighting among themselves with two particularly vivid ghostly figures among them. One of these prominent spirits radiates blue light and seems to be clad in Aeldari armour. The other is engulfed in purple flames and clad in a xenos ceremonial raiment. They utter sounds reminiscent of Aeldari speech, but any attempts to translate them have proved unsuccessful thus far."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の兵が、かつて宮殿か巨大な機械として機能していたゼノの遺跡にたどり着き、ぎゅうぎゅうに密集していた精霊たちに遭遇しました。どうやら精霊たちの間で争いが起きていて、その中でも特に2体の精霊の姿が鮮明だったそうです。そのうちの1体は青い光を放ち、アエルダリの鎧をまとっているようです。他方は紫色の炎に包まれ、ゼノの儀式用の衣装をまとっています。彼らはアエルダリの言葉と似たような音を発しているのですが、これまでのところ翻訳の試みは成功していないとのことです」

languages.text: « Nos troupes ont atteint les ruines xénos, qui devaient autrefois faire office de palais ou de machine titanesque. Les esprits y sont présents en très grand nombre. Ils semblent se battre entre eux, et deux silhouettes éthérées se détachent parmi les hordes fantomatiques. La première irradie d'une lumière bleutée et paraît vêtue d'une armure aeldari, tandis que l'autre est baignée de flammes mauves et porte une tenue de cérémonie de facture xénos. Ils parlent une langue qui évoque l'aeldari, mais toutes nos tentatives de traduction ont échoué jusqu'à présent. »
languages.original_text: "Our people have reached the xenos ruins that once served as either a palace or a gargantuan machine. They have encountered an extremely high concentration of spirits. It appears the spirits are fighting among themselves with two particularly vivid ghostly figures among them. One of these prominent spirits radiates blue light and seems to be clad in Aeldari armour. The other is engulfed in purple flames and clad in a xenos ceremonial raiment. They utter sounds reminiscent of Aeldari speech, but any attempts to translate them have proved unsuccessful thus far."

traits.locale_text: « Nos troupes ont atteint les ruines xénos, qui devaient autrefois faire office de palais ou de machine titanesque. Les esprits y sont présents en très grand nombre. Ils semblent se battre entre eux, et deux silhouettes éthérées se détachent parmi les hordes fantomatiques. La première irradie d'une lumière bleutée et paraît vêtue d'une armure aeldari, tandis que l'autre est baignée de flammes mauves et porte une tenue de cérémonie de facture xénos. Ils parlent une langue qui évoque l'aeldari, mais toutes nos tentatives de traduction ont échoué jusqu'à présent. »

languages.text: "Unser Volk hat die Xenos-Ruinen erreicht, die einst entweder als Palast oder als gigantische Maschine gedient haben. Sie sind auf eine extrem hohe Konzentration von Geistern gestoßen. Die Geister bekämpfen sich offenbar gegenseitig. Es sind zwei besonders mächtige gespenstische Gestalten darunter. Einer dieser herausragenden Geister strahlt blaues Licht aus und scheint eine Aeldari-Rüstung zu tragen. Der andere ist von violetten Flammen umgeben und trägt ein zeremonielles Xenos-Gewand. Sie geben Geräusche von sich, die an die Sprache der Aeldari erinnern, aber alle Versuche, sie zu übersetzen, waren bisher vergebens."
languages.original_text: "Our people have reached the xenos ruins that once served as either a palace or a gargantuan machine. They have encountered an extremely high concentration of spirits. It appears the spirits are fighting among themselves with two particularly vivid ghostly figures among them. One of these prominent spirits radiates blue light and seems to be clad in Aeldari armour. The other is engulfed in purple flames and clad in a xenos ceremonial raiment. They utter sounds reminiscent of Aeldari speech, but any attempts to translate them have proved unsuccessful thus far."

Sie geben Geräusche von sich, die an die Sprache der Aeldari erinnern, aber alle Versuche, sie zu übersetzen, waren bisher vergebens."

languages.text: "Askerlerimiz, bir vakitler ya bir saray ya da devasa bir makine olarak hizmet etmiş zeno harabelerine ulaştı. Bir hayli yoğun bir ruh nüfusu ile karşılaştılar. Görünüşe göre ruhlar kendi aralarında savaşıyor. Aralarında bilhassa daha da ışıltılı iki hayaletvari suret mevcut. Dikkat çeken bu ruhlardan biri, mavi ışık yayıyor ve Aeldari zırhı kuşanmış gibi görünüyor. Diğerinin ise mor alevler etrafını tamamen sarmış ve üzerinde bir zeno tören kıyafeti görünüyor. Aeldari lisanını anımsatan sözler ettikleri duyulsa da bunları tercüme etmeye dair tüm girişimler, şu ana dek başarısızlıkla sonuçlandı."
languages.original_text: "Our people have reached the xenos ruins that once served as either a palace or a gargantuan machine. They have encountered an extremely high concentration of spirits. It appears the spirits are fighting among themselves with two particularly vivid ghostly figures among them. One of these prominent spirits radiates blue light and seems to be clad in Aeldari armour. The other is engulfed in purple flames and clad in a xenos ceremonial raiment. They utter sounds reminiscent of Aeldari speech, but any attempts to translate them have proved unsuccessful thus far."
